indications:
Indications 
(From 9.6.6 Vitamin K: British National Formulary)
9.6.6 Vitamin K
name: MENADIOL SODIUM PHOSPHATE
cautions:
Cautions G6PD deficiency (section 9.1.5) and vitamin E deficiency (risk
of haemolysis); interactions: Appendix
1 (vitamins)
doses: 10–40 mg daily, adjusted as necessary; child under 18 years see BNF for Children
pregnancy:
Pregnancy avoid in late pregnancy and labour unless benefit
outweighs risk of neonatal haemolytic anaemia, hyperbilirubinaemia,
and kernicterus in neonate
